user_instruction: 'Compose an email to get ConstructCo Solutions started on the new project. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["support@constructcosolutions.com"],"subject":"Kickoff for New Project Collaboration","body":"Hello ConstructCo Solutions Team,

I hope you're doing well. I'm excited to get our new project underway and look forward to collaborating closely with your team.

To set us up for success, our immediate next steps are:
• Align on the project objectives and success metrics.
• Finalize a high-level timeline and key milestones.
• Confirm roles, primary points of contact, and communication cadence.

Could you please share your availability for a short virtual kickoff call early next week? Once we have a slot confirmed, I'll circulate the draft project charter and related materials so we can review them together.

Thank you for your support. I’m confident that, together, we’ll deliver a strong result.

Best regards,
Jane Doe"}
